channel.title: CVE Feed for WatchGuard -- Authentication Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WatchGuard -- Authentication Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-6592|2024-09-25T14:29:12.827Z -- watchguard -- authentication%20gateway
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in the protocol communication between the WatchGuard Authentication Gateway (aka Single Sign-On Agent) on Windows and the WatchGuard Single Sign-On Client on Windows and MacOS allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects the Authentication Gateway: through 12.10.2; Windows Single Sign-On Client: through 12.7; MacOS Single Sign-On Client: through 12.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-6592|2024-09-25T11:16:01.320Z -- watchguard -- authentication%20gateway
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in the protocol communication between the WatchGuard Authentication Gateway (aka Single Sign-On Agent) on Windows and the WatchGuard Single Sign-On Client on Windows and MacOS allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects the Authentication Gateway: through 12.10.2; Windows Single Sign-On Client: through 12.7; MacOS Single Sign-On Client: through 12.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-6593|2024-09-25T11:16:15.822Z -- watchguard -- authentication%20gateway
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in WatchGuard Authentication Gateway (aka Single Sign-On Agent) on Windows allows an attacker with network access to execute restricted management commands. This issue affects Authentication Gateway: through 12.10.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-6593|2024-09-25T13:53:45.988Z -- watchguard -- authentication%20gateway
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in WatchGuard Authentication Gateway (aka Single Sign-On Agent) on Windows allows an attacker with network access to execute restricted management commands. This issue affects Authentication Gateway: through 12.10.2.
